creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text: Any chance you could create a simple PPTX slideshow in PowerPoint, one slide shown and one hidden, and either upload it here or check the XML inside to identify the hidden flag? We can then quite quickly add the missing matching getter / setter methods
Let's leave this one open until getHidden is part of the XSLF like API. We don't want users to rely on the underlying xmlbean implementation.
